channel.title: Broken Bones lol. (Sprained, twisted or broken)
channel.description:
Haha, last night I busted my toe and now it is turned at a 90° Angle. IT HURTS LIKE ****!!!!!!!!!!!
What have you sprained, twisted or broken?

item.title: Broken Bones lol. (Sprained, twisted or broken)
item.dc:creator: @orcashark orcashark
item.description:
@orcashark wrote:

Well ive fractured my knee twice, does that count?
When i was, i think 11, first time, i ran out and a car clipped me and i went like, over the car and landed knee first. Second time was when my friend was trying to show off on his bike and lost control and nailed me, (I also broke my arm on that.)

item.title: Broken Bones lol. (Sprained, twisted or broken)
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote="`Aaron, post:20, topic:353423"][quote author=pure2ownage link=topic=449748.msg3299710#msg3299710 date=1281210075]

Yeah I’ve broken 8 bones.

When i was younger i was getting chased by a dog that was really aggressive and it had rabies, so when i finally rann like 10 or 12 blocks he still kept chasing me, so i turned around and as hard as i could i punched the dog in the skull, i broke all 4 of my knuckles, after the dog was taken away they found out at the autopsy or something, that the dog had rabies.

I have broken both of my hands at boxing and broke my leg and my chin for disobeying my trainer.

[/quote]Did the dog have a dent on his skull?

I don’t know when i hit him he was just limp, when i hit him he just yelped and didn’t move, but his stomach was still moving.[/quote]Lool

Read full topic

item.title: Broken Bones lol. (Sprained, twisted or broken)
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:16, topic:353423”][quote author=jmood128 link=topic=449748.msg3299520#msg3299520 date=1281199000]

Never thought of it that way, damn, I suck

No that’s why we love you.
[/quote]

I used to go on the trampoline a lot though.
And I play drums a lot, although it’s pretty unlikely I’ll break a bone from that

I have never broken anything, there is a difference from being inside to much, and knowing what mite happen and how to avoid it, but I have…sprained my wrist like 8 times each on them, twisted my thumb over my first finger twisted my ankle sprained it…but no I have never broke anything.

Ouch.[/quote]I always wanted to drum

item.title: Broken Bones lol. (Sprained, twisted or broken)
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

Over the years I have broken/fractured numerous toes, fingers and ribs but more srs:

When I was two I thought it would be fun to climb out of my cot. I fell out and broke my arm.

Around two months ago I lost traction on a halfpipe which caused me to skid down and fracture my arm with the bone sticking out of the skin. Om nom nom

Read full topic

item.title: Broken Bones lol. (Sprained, twisted or broken)
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

When I was 4 I had my hands on the floor and my feet on the wall. I attempted to walk up the wall like that and I slipped and broke my leg from my hip bone.

Also 3 years ago I slipped in some mud and landed full body force on my right hand and now it clicks every time I move my mouse to click on a scroll bar.

EDIT: I also have arthritis that has spread throughout my body

Read full topic
